questions: Is MUT INPUT a similar scenario compared with MUT TESTS?
Will MUT work differently when executing under MUT INPUT?
Will MUT raise any runtime error or exception when executing under MUT INPUT?
Does MUT still produce correct results when executing under MUT INPUT?
Will MUT INPUT reveal any bug in MUT? If YES, which line of code is buggy?
task: Given a MUT and a MUT INPUT, you should answer all questions in QUESTIONS. For each question, you should answer with YES or NO and give a reasonable explanation. Put only YES or NO between [ANSWER] and [/ANSWER] tags. Explanation must be between [EXPLANATION] and [/EXPLANATION] tags. Put the buggy line of code between [BUGGYLINE] and [/BUGGYLINE] tags if exists.
